name: PlunderDrunk
description:
You've run out of gold for drinks. You must collect gold by killing skeletons and sailing to new islands to find treasures.  

Use W to move forward and S to move backward. Left click to attack. E to interact (follow prompts). press Q to quit. Once you’ve collect enough gold to pay your tab head back to the bar and win the game! 

Gerald Clark - Programming, Audio

Destin Fritz - Game Design, Level Design, Art, UI
